caption:
“The voice of one crying in the wilderness.” — Isaiah 40:3

Reflection:
From solitude rises truth unafraid. The wilderness becomes the womb of revelation.

Commentary:
Isaiah’s cry reminds us that renewal begins in the wild places — when comfort falls silent, the call of purpose grows clear.
